author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Salem Railway division has achieved electrification of the track in the Mettupalayam – Coimbatore North Railway station in the recent past.

Referring to the other achievements made by the division in the first half of the current financial year, Divisional Railway Manager Shubhranshu said that new waiting halls have been set up in Salem Junction and 15 Automatic Ticket Vending Machines (ATVMs) have been installed at all important stations.

The other projects include, a new station building at Coimbatore North, construction of second entry and passenger waiting hall in Tirupur and removal of scissors cross in Coimbatore.

To enhance safety in operation of trains the high level platform at Bommidi has been extended, new foot-over bridge has come up at Sankaridurg besides new retiring rooms at Karur and coach guidance display system in Coimbatore.

Online complaint management system was introduced for the passengers and during the period between April to December last year, about 500 complaints have been redressed. Besides, the complaints received through emails and social media like Whatsapp, Twitter and Facebook are also redressed immediately.
title: Good show by Salem rail division
